column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last week , I decided to travel to see my brother .
#id=2
#text=I went to the airport with my luggage and checked in with the airline , where I received my ticket from the clerk .
#id=3
#text=My luggage was weighed and tagged and I gave it to the clerk .
#id=4
#text=I proceeded upstairs with my ticket and waited in line to go through airport security .
#id=5
#text=Once I went through the security checkpoint , I located the concourse area and gate where my flight was to depart from .
#id=6
#text=I sat and waited until my flight was boarding .
#id=7
#text=I then got up and waited in line to get on the airplane .
#id=8
#text=While I was waiting in line , I checked my seat number .
#id=9
#text=Once I was on the plane , I located my seat and sat down .
#text=I then buckled my seat belt and took out a book to read during the flight .
#text=As the plane prepared to take off , the flight attendant went over all of the emergency procedures .
#text=Once the plane was flying in the air , the flight attendant asked me if I wanted a beverage .
#text=I choose to have a cup of orange juice and was also given a bag of pretzels as a snack .
#text=I continued to read my book with my seat belt on until the Captain of the flight came over the loud speaker and said that we were approaching our destination .
#text=The plane landed and I put my book away .
#text=When I got off of the plane , my brother was waiting for me at the gate .
#text=We had a very nice trip together .
